name: Sprint03Final
description: Sprint 3 project is all about adding animations to the game. 3 prefabs are able to be selected by the user. For the animation prefabs there is the option to of three different animations. Wobble, Rotate and UpnDown. The Speed of the animations can also be changed and altered. By default all animations move at the speed of 1 sec however the user can make the speed as fast as 4 seconds or slow it down to 0 seconds freezing the animations. Two toggles are available one for random animations and random speed. By default these are toggled to off however the user has the ability to turn them on. While Random animation is toggled on, when the user draws all animations for prefabs will be random and mixed. While Speed animation is toggled on, when the user draws all animations the speeds will be mixed. 2 of 3 prefab animations can be altered with the opacity, glow and colors.
